description: Exposes .NET CLI capabilities (SDKs, runtimes, environment info) via MCP. Query installed SDKs, runtimes, effective versions, and .NET environment details through natural language.
name: io.github.peterblazejewicz/mcp-dotnet-cli

environment_variables.name: MCPDOTNETCLI_Logging__MinimumLevel
environment_variables.description: Set logging level: Trace, Debug, Information, Warning, Error, Critical

environment_variables.name: MCPDOTNETCLI_Logging__File__Path
environment_variables.description: Path for log file output (default: logs/mcp-dotnet-cli-server-.log)

environment_variables.name: MCPDOTNETCLI_ENVIRONMENT
environment_variables.description: Environment name for configuration (Development, Staging, Production). Falls back to DOTNET_ENVIRONMENT if not set.

tools.name: list_installed_sdks
tools.description: Lists all installed .NET SDKs with versions and paths

tools.name: list_installed_runtimes
tools.description: Lists all installed .NET runtimes with versions and paths

tools.name: get_effective_sdk
tools.description: Gets the effective SDK version in a directory (respects global.json)

tools.name: check_sdk_version
tools.description: Checks if a specific SDK version is installed

tools.name: get_latest_sdk
tools.description: Gets the latest installed SDK version

author: Piotr Błażejewicz
